heading: Occupant notification for alteration work
text:
When an elevator is to be out of service for alteration work, notice shall be
given to the residential occupants no fewer than 10 business days before the start of the work, except in the case of emergency repairs.
This notification requirement does not apply to minor alterations and ordinary repairs.
*Section 28-304.10 was added by: Local Law 47 of 2015. This law has an effective date of September 30, 2015.
*
